actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit sex discrimination in programs and activities receiving Federal financial assistance.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Prohibits sex discrimination, under the Civil Rights Act of 1964, in programs and activities receiving Federal financial assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit sex discrimination in programs and activities receiving Federal financial assistance.
